ActorTalk: Yes. Look, Commandant. Some are families who came together, and others are tourists here on their own.
Constructs, humans, even mechanoids... they all seem to be caught up in the lively atmosphere. You can see it in their smiles.
Am I...? Maybe I got swept up in the celebration too, without even realizing it.
Not long ago, this square was just a quiet, empty street. It's only because of you, and everyone's efforts, that it's been brought back to life like this.
This may not be a battlefield, but I know there are still enemies hiding in the shadows. So every smile here... it's well-earned.
Will you take a walk with me, Commandant?
You've always been going around as a Commissioner. But today, during this celebration, I hope you can put that aside, at least for a little while, and take time for yourself.
Let's just be two ordinary visitors today, and enjoy the celebration like everyone else. Is that alright, Commandant?
What were you just looking at?
